org.mongodb.morphia.mapping
Class MappedField

java.lang.Object
  org.mongodb.morphia.mapping.MappedField
Direct Known Subclasses:
EphemeralMappedField
public class MappedField
extends Object

Represents the mapping of this field to/from mongodb (name, list)

Author:
Scott Hernandez
